Room.Name: Nyyron Water Chamber
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a very damp chamber behind the curtain of the Nyyron Waterfall.
Room.LongDescription: The slabs of stone in here are warm to the touch, and steam from the water fills the room, making your sore muscles relax. The chamber looks clean and comfortable, and is certainly well hidden. This might be a good place to rest awhile. There are some runes on the wall, which indicates this place may have been used for magic spells at one time.
